name: towers-notifier
description: Additional component to the Towers game. It watches the database for changes and notifies players of game changes.

scripts.deploy: npm run build-docker; npm run stop-remote; npm run install-remote; npm run start-remote
scripts.build-docker: docker build -t floschnell/towers-notifier .; docker push floschnell/towers-notifier
scripts.stop-remote: ssh root@floschnell.de "docker stop towers-notifier; docker rm towers-notifier"
scripts.start-remote: ssh root@floschnell.de "docker run -d --restart=unless-stopped --name=towers-notifier floschnell/towers-notifier; sleep 3; docker logs towers-notifier;"

author: Florian Schnell
